TopicTitle: Help with my orbits and Mechjeb.

Articles.Content:
I cant get in to a good orbit around Kerbin i have tried many rocket designs and i can get it right. I can get in to an orbit around the sun but thats very simple can someone please help.

Also does anyone know how to use Mechjeb?

(If there is a mod that can help with this can you tell me.)

MechJeb is actually pretty simple to use: you open the Ascent module, tell it what altitude you want your orbit to be, and you can also choose the heading/inclination and change the ascent profile.

Once set up, everything is automatic and you'll get in orbit (provided your rocket can actually do it).
